query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZLET002 ( MANDT, ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, ZTON1, ZTON2, ZTON3, ZTON4, ZTON5, ZTON6, ZTON7, ZTON8, ZTON9, ZTON10, ZTON11, ZTON12, ZTON13, ZTON14, ZTON15, LIFNR, ZHYUN, ERDAT, ERZET, DPTEN, UPTEN, TPLST, BEZEI, ZTEXT, ERNAM, ZCONF, AEDAT, UZEIT, ZTYPE, ZCANC, ZCHAN, ZTRANS, ZINDAT, ZINZET, ZOUTDAT, ZOUTZET, AENAM, LAEDA, CHANGE_TIME, ZTRCOST, ZFULLSET, ZFULLSET2, TPLSTDT1, TPLSTDT2, TPLSTDT3, TPLSTDT4, TPLSTDT5, TPLSTDT6, TPLSTDT7, TPLSTDTQTY1, TPLSTDTQTY2, TPLSTDTQTY3, TPLSTDTQTY4, TPLSTDTQTY5, TPLSTDTQTY6, TPLSTDTQTY7, TPLSTDTZTON1, TPLSTDTZTON2, TPLSTDTZTON3, TPLSTDTZTON4, TPLSTDTZTON5, TPLSTDTZTON6, TPLSTDTZTON7 ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #ZKNUM#, #ZKNUM2#, #ZTON1#, #ZTON2#, #ZTON3#, #ZTON4#, #ZTON5#, #ZTON6#, #ZTON7#, #ZTON8#, #ZTON9#, #ZTON10#, #ZTON11#, #ZTON12#, #ZTON13#, #ZTON14#, #ZTON15#, #LIFNR#, #ZHYUN#, #ERDAT#, #ERZET#, #DPTEN#, #UPTEN#, #TPLST#, #BEZEI#, #ZTEXT#, #G_USER_ID#, '', HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), '11', '', '', '', '00000000', '000000', '00000000', '000000', '', '00000000', '000000', #ZTRCOST#, #ZFULLSET#, #ZFULLSET2#, #TPLSTDT1#, #TPLSTDT2#, #TPLSTDT3#, #TPLSTDT4#, #TPLSTDT5#, #TPLSTDT6#, #TPLSTDT7#, #TPLSTDTQTY1#, #TPLSTDTQTY2#, #TPLSTDTQTY3#, #TPLSTDTQTY4#, #TPLSTDTQTY5#, #TPLSTDTQTY6#, #TPLSTDTQTY7#, #TPLSTDTZTON1#, #TPLSTDTZTON2#, #TPLSTDTZTON3#, #TPLSTDTZTON4#, #TPLSTDTZTON5#, #TPLSTDTZTON6#, #TPLSTDTZTON7# )
